Package it.polimi.ingsw.GUI

Class PositionSelectionPanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
it.polimi.ingsw.GUI.PositionSelectionPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class PositionSelectionPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
panel used to ask the user for the positions in which he wants to place his workers at the beginning of the game
See Also:
Serialized Form
